Story

In the Great Black Out of 20XX all digital data known to mankind got destroyed or corrupted. Ayla lost all her childhood memories she stored in a cloud. On accident she finds a hint on where her lost data might be. Finally her hacking skills come to the ultimate test. Is the data still intact? What is her past?

The Game

DEEP DIVE combines Bullet Hell with Memory Games. You got 10 Seconds to memorize a pattern. After that you can fire Orbs every second at the direction of your Mouse Cursor.

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Shift/Space/Ctrl/Alt - Dash

Enter the eye to come closer to your goal.

Afterthoughts 

This game was made for LDJAM51. Theme was "Every 10 seconds".

My comment on LDJAM 04.10.2022:

It is my first game ever actually (with a beginning and an end that is). I did everything by myself and from scratch (except the glass cracking sound, but that was public domain). Totally forgot to add some insights. These 3 days were tough. Don’t got the full 72 hours because of important privat stuff. Hated the theme… Was nervous the whole time… Boy oh boy. But I learned a lot! And I’m glad I made it in the end.
